alert.note: Alert for Hancock; Henderson (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 05 at 10:16AM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CDT TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of west central Illinois, southeast Iowa and northeast Missouri, including the following counties, in west central Illinois, Hancock and Henderson. In southeast Iowa, Des Moines and Lee. In northeast Missouri, Clark. * WHEN...Until noon CDT. * IMPACTS...Numerous roads remain closed due to flooding. Low-water crossings are likely inundated with water and may not be passable. It will take several hours for all the water from these storms to work through local drainage systems in urban areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1014 AM CDT, The rain has ended across the area and water levels are beginning to recede. Travel across Clark County Missouri is discouraged due to numerous washouts on secondary roads.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
